summary: A purchase order from SigNet Technologies, Inc. to ADI for network equipment, with a revised ship-to address for MCC New York at 150 Park Row, New York, NY. The document shows a financial transaction potentially related to the Epstein case, as it references a revised shipping location to New York.

persons.name: Fred Pridemore
persons.context: Listed as the buyer on the purchase order from SigNet Technologies, Inc.

events.title: Purchase Order Issued
events.description: SigNet Technologies, Inc. issued purchase order F8P000391 to ADI for network equipment, with a revised ship-to address for MCC New York.

locations: 12300 Kiln Court Suite E Beltsville, MD 20705
keyFacts: The purchase order shows a revised ship-to address for 'MCC New York' at 150 Park Row, New York, NY 10007.
The total amount of the purchase order is $3102,598.83 for network equipment from ADI.
The document is dated August 20, 2019, which is after Jeffrey Epstein's arrest in July 2019.
SigNet Technologies, Inc. is based in Beltsville, MD with tax ID 42-1578695.
Fred Pridemore is identified as the buyer for this transaction.
